attributes.action: explain if government vehicles will have to pay a congestion charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government vehicles take up as much room on the road. Government vehicles which are not an aid to cutting congestion should have to pay a congestion fee possibly to wild life charities or tree planting schemes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
